scriptures.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
Those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
The Lord is my light and my salvationâ€”whom shall I fear?
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
For the Spirit God gave us does not make us timid, but gives us power, love, and self-discipline.
Do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.
If God is for us, who can be against us?
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
By small and simple things are great things brought to pass.
For it must needs be, that there is an opposition in all things.
And if men come unto me I will show unto them their weakness.
When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
Adam fell that men might be; and men are, that they might have joy.
Yea, come unto Christ, and be perfected in him.
It is upon the rock of our Redeemer that ye must build your foundation.
Whoso believeth in God might with surety hope for a better world.
Let your light so shine before this people, that they may see your good works.
I will also ease the burdens which are put upon your shoulders.
